text: The name of the Suns scares the enemy to their hearts.
Under the rule of Sun Jian and Ce, the Sun clan prospered each members worked together as one.
Ability: The Eight Riders of Sui
These men have risen under Han Sui's gaze and have been given a fit name.

Gao Lan will prove that he is unmatched in all of Hebei!
With Taoist rituals and chanting, Zhang Lu inspires his men to do the impossible.
With his reputation of sheer compassion and kindness, Liu Yu bolsters his men to continue the fight.
With his years of combat experience, Bao Xin truly leads by heavenly example.
Flee, villain, before the indomitable chucking of Chen Ying!
The lineage and heritage of the Yuan cannot be questioned!
Let the enemy charge falter against the unbroken formation of Gao Gan.
Gongsun Kang walks a tight balance, all in the name of his own ambitions.
Fear the blade of a mistreated warlord, lest you be the one who rots in the very mud he crawled his way out of.
The ambition and pride of Qu Yi is set to be reaped by friend and foe alike.
The very northern winds guide the warrior's blade.
A discombobulating shout shakes the foe to their very bones.
Few can fathom exactly how Gan Ji can breathe out billowing flames from his very being, given they are usually burning to death seconds later.

Against our lines our opponents will break, like water scattering off the tortoise's shell.

With a single yell, Wang Yi disillusions all who draw blades against her.
